atk_abil: Normal Attack: Attacks enemy by shooting multiple ice crystals with a chance of freezing the target.
Skill Attack: Attacks multiple enemies by shooting a giant chunk of ice with a chance to freezing the targets.
Special Ability 1: Increases the game speed by 6% and movement speed and critical damage of Orc units by 5%.
Special Ability 2: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000.

Weaken Crystal (Orc) : Upon reviving as an Orc, the enemy's crystal HP on the stage battle is partly reduced. Reduced by 1% for every 5-star unit and 2% for every 6 star unit. Applied even when in Time Shop, and the unit's maximum crystal HP cannot be reduced by more than 20%.

Pact of the Grand Chief: Increases stats of all soldiers (Attack / Defense / HP) by 7 levels for ever 5-star unit, 15 for every 6-star unit. Applies in Time Shop, but cannot exceed 150 levels. Pact of the Grand Chief only applies to Stage Combat (main game mode)
